mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from Health Partners suits your health profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization (up to $500,000), outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care â€“ all essential aspects given your multiple conditions including hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, stroke, and shortness of breath. The premium at $300 per month is manageable for a high-income individual (income bracket = high). Additionally, the annual out-of-pocket maximum of $6500 helps cap your expenses in case of extensive medical needs related to your health conditions. While this plan excludes cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, it prioritizes affordability without compromising on necessary care.
